member.summary: Gets or sets the source for the image.
member.value: The source of the image control.
member.remarks:
The property supports the following types:
Type Description
A string will be transformed to a object with a relative path. A new BitmapImage will be loaded asynchronously and assigned to the internal image element. Only png and .jpeg files are supported usings string directly.
The image source will be directly assigned. No animations will be used.
The image will be assigned. Depending of the fact, if it is an animated image or not, the animation will be started immediatly.
